items.title: Jim Cramer Recommends Buying Goldman Sachs
items.description: The Goldman Sachs Group, Inc. (NYSE:GS) is one of the stocks that Jim Cramer shed light on. The company was mentioned during the episode, as Cramer commented: “Yeah… both (GS and COF) of these are buys … Why not buy Goldman Sachs? They’re very much involved (in the booming IPO market), and it was down […]
